title: Unlocking the potential of cadmium plating chemistry for low-polarization, long-cycling, and ultrahigh-efficiency aqueous metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4770-4779
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01615G, Paper
Swati Katiyar, Songyang Chang, Irfan Ullah, Wentao Hou, Amanda Conde-Delmoral, Shen Qiu, Gerardo Morell, Xianyong Wu
Cadmium metal exhibits superior plating chemistry for aqueous batteries, including low polarization (∼5 mV), long cycling life (4000 hours), and ultrahigh Coulombic efficiencies (99.60–99.92%).
